T02D2022:85a-1: ya m'a ri yantra aa ba li /
T02D2022:85a-3: gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi phreng ba /
T02D2022:85a-4: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2022:85a-5: dmar po dang ser po dang /
T02D2022:85a-6: nag po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'i mdog gi
T02D2022:85a-7: dbye bas phrin las kyi rjes su 'brangs nas bsgom
T02D2022:85a-8: par bya'o // de nas bzlas pa rjes su dran pa ni /
T02D2022:85a-9: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2022:85a-10: na ma:che ge mo sh'antim ku ru na ma:sv'a h'a
T02D2022:85a-11: / rgyas pa la boo shat dgug pa la dza: bskrad pa la bam /
T02D2022:85a-12: dbang du bsdu ba la ho: rengs pa la lam /
T02D2022:85a-15: de ltar nges pa la sogs pa'i phrin las rnams la gdags par bya'o //
T02D2022:85a-23: ni r'am ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2022:85a-24: 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po'i phrin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2022:85a-25: bud med rnams kyi srung ba dang zhi ba la gi wang gis dar dkar po'am /
T02D2022:85a-26: gro ga'am smyug ma'i shun pa'am /
T02D2022:85a-27: ras dkar po la 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris ta /
T02D2022:85a-28: na m'a:yi ge ming la btags la nag nog la
T02D2022:85a-29: sogs pa med pa'i rdza phor kha sbyor gyi nang
T02D2022:85a-30: du bcug ste / mar dang sprang rtsi'i nang du
T02D2022:85a-31: bcug nas skud pa dkar pos dril te thun gsum
T02D2022:85a-32: du me tog dkar pos mchod /
T02D2022:85a-33: shar phyogs su bltas la gshin rje gshed dkar po
T02D2022:85a-34: bsgom zhing mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2022:85a-35: du bsgrub bya dmigs nas rang gi snying ga nas
T02D2022:85a-36: khug pa lta bu'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gshin
T02D2022:85a-37: rje gshed dkar po rnams kyis bum pa dkar po
T02D2022:85a-38: zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i chus yongs su gang bas dbang
T02D2022:85a-39: bskur bar bsams la sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02D2022:85a-40: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2022:85a-41: na ma:che ge mo sh'antim ku ru na ma:sv'a h'a
T02D2022:85a-43: skyes pa rnams kyis zhi ba dang /
T02D2022:85a-44: rgyas pa la gur gum gyi 'khor lo gnyis boo shat dang bcas pa mngon par bris te /
T02D2022:85a-45: sv'a h'a yi ge ming la btags la mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bcug nas /
T02D2022:85a-46: skud pa ser pos dril te /
T02D2022:85a-47: thun gsum du me tog ser pos mchod /
T02D2022:85b-0: @85b byang du kha bltas pas gshin rje gshed ser po bsgoms te /
T02D2022:85b-1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la gnas pa'i bsgrub
T02D2022:85b-2: bya bsam zhing dmigs nas rang gi snying gnas 'od
T02D2022:85b-3: zer ser po las byung ba'i gshin rje gshed ser
T02D2022:85b-4: po dpag tu med pa rnams kyis gser gyi bum
T02D2022:85b-5: pa ser po / bdud rtsi ser pos gang bas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02D2022:85b-6: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2022:85b-7: boo shat che ge mo pushtim ku ru boo shat sv'a h'a /
T02D2022:85b-9: gro ga'am ras dkar po la rgya skyegs kyi khu
T02D2022:85b-10: ba'am tsandan dmar pos ming med kyi khrag dang bsres
T02D2022:85b-11: pas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te ho:'i yi
T02D2022:85b-12: ge ming la btags la nag nog la sogs pa
T02D2022:85b-13: med pa'i / so legs par btang ba'i rdza phor dmar po kha sbyor du bcug la /
T02D2022:85b-14: mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bcug nas skud pa dmar pos dril te me tog dmar pos mchod /
T02D2022:85b-15: nub tu bltas la bdag nyid gshin rje gshed dmar po bsgoms te /
T02D2022:85b-16: mdun du zla ba dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya bsams te /
T02D2022:85b-17: rang gi snying ga nas spros pa'i 'od zer dmar
T02D2022:85b-18: pos lus kun tu gang bas myos par gyur te
T02D2022:85b-19: / rkang pa gnyis la mdud par bsam zhing /
T02D2022:85b-20: spobs pas sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02D2022:85b-21: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2022:85b-22: ho:che ge mo lha spyin gyi ched du ba shyam
T02D2022:85b-24: gal te dbang du ma gyur na mar dang sbrang
T02D2022:85b-25: rtsi med pa'i 'khor lo nyid du ba med pa'i
T02D2022:85b-26: seng ldeng gi me la bdug cing /
T02D2022:85b-27: rang gi rnal 'byor gyis ji skad bshad pa'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2022:85b-29: aom hr'i:shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat
T02D2022:85b-30: phat boo shat che ge mo bdag gi dbang du
T02D2022:85b-31: gyis shig / boo shat sv'a h'a /
T02D2022:85b-32: dbang du bsdu ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2022:85b-33: dur khrod kyi ras sam zla mtshan gyi ras la
T02D2022:85b-34: chos kyi khu bas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris
T02D2022:85b-35: la yi ge dza:'am hr'i:'am yang na gnyis ka ming
T02D2022:85b-36: la btags la rdza phor kha sbyor ram bud med
T02D2022:85b-37: kyi thod pa kha sbyor du bcug la /
T02D2022:85b-39: skud pa dmar pos dril te dgongs thun nyi ma
T02D2022:85b-40: lta bur gshin rje gshed du bdag nyid bsgoms te
T02D2022:85b-41: / rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer las byung ba'i
T02D2022:85b-42: gshin rje gshed dmar po zhags pa dang lcags kyu
T02D2022:86a-2: bsgrub bya'i snying la lcags kyus bkug / zhags pas rke la btags nas 'gugs par bsams nas /
T02D2022:86a-4: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2022:86a-5: dza: che ge mo'i chod du mchod spyin a'a karsha
T02D2022:86a-6: ya dza:sv'a h'a / yang na hr'i:yang na gnyis ka'o //
T02D2022:86a-7: gal te 'ong bar ma gyur na 'khor lo de
T02D2022:86a-8: nyid du ba med pa'i seng ldeng gi me la
T02D2022:86a-9: bdug cing sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2022:86a-11: dur khrod kyi ras la zla ba'am /
T02D2022:86a-12: yung bas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2022:86a-13: bsgrub bya'i ming la yi ge lam btags te /
T02D2022:86a-14: nag nog la sogs med pa'i rdza phor kha sbyor
T02D2022:86a-15: du gzhug / rdza phor de'i steng du re kh'a
T02D2022:86a-16: ser po gru bzhi pa bdun bris te /
T02D2022:86a-17: de'i steng du h'um bam h'um gi yi ge gsum
T02D2022:86a-18: gyis mtshan pa'i lcog brgyad dang ldan pa'i ri rab
T02D2022:86a-19: / de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor lam
T02D2022:86a-20: gyi mtshan pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan par bris
T02D2022:86a-21: / te / me tog ser pos mchod /
T02D2022:86a-22: skud pa ser pos dril te /
T02D2022:86a-23: bdag nyid kha lhor bltas la gshin rje gshed ser po bsgom te /
T02D2022:86a-24: mdun du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya ser po bsams la /
T02D2022:86a-25: bsgrub bya'i mgo'i steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2022:86a-26: de'i steng du ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje rgya
T02D2022:86a-27: gram gyis mnan par bsams la sngags bzlas pa ni
T02D2022:86a-28: / aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2022:86a-29: lam che ge mo stambhu ya lam mnan pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2022:86a-30: ngag mnan par 'dod pas de bzhin du 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2022:86a-31: bsgrub bya'i ming la yi ge lam btags nas bzlas pa ni /
T02D2022:86a-32: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2022:86a-33: lam lha spyin gyi ji ltar sems pa'i don la
T02D2022:86a-35: mi snyan par smra ba'i mchod spyin ngag mnan par gyis shig / lam zhes sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2022:86a-37: lkugs par 'dod par dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2022:86a-38: yi ge bam bsgrub bya'i ming la btags nas gshin
T02D2022:86a-39: rje gshed ser po'i rnal 'byor gyi cho gas bsgrub
T02D2022:86a-40: bya de lug gi snying gar rab tu bkug nas
T02D2022:86a-41: / dbang chen gyi 'khor lo ba zhis za ma
T02D2022:86a-42: tog bzhin du kha sbyor byas te rengs pa'i kha
T02D2022:86a-43: sbyor gyi cho ga bzlas par bya ba ni /
T02D2022:86b-0: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um @86b phat phat bam /
T02D2022:86b-1: lha spyin gyi kha chings shig / yid chings shig / lkugs par gyis shig bam /
T02D2022:86b-2: yul chos la sogs pa la rmongs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2022:86b-3: dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang ske tshe dang tsha dang mar nag dang /
T02D2022:86b-5: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang /
T02D2022:86b-6: ro bsregs pa'i sol ba dang rang gi sdigs mdzub gyi khrag gis snag tsha byas te /
T02D2022:86b-7: bya rog gi sgro rkang gis smyu gu byas la 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2022:86b-8: yi ge h'um bsgrub bya'i ming la btags la thod
T02D2022:86b-9: pa kha sbyor gyi nang du bcug nas skud pa
T02D2022:86b-11: nyi ma gung la dur khrod du sbas nas kha lhor bltas te /
T02D2022:86b-12: gshin rje gshed nag po g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gis nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D2022:86b-13: bzhin mi sdug cing mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2022:86b-14: glog ltar ljags 'gyu ba shin tu mi bzad pa /
T02D2022:86b-15: bskal pa'i me ltar shin tu 'bar ba /
T02D2022:86b-16: phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar ba /
T02D2022:86b-17: dbyar gyi char sprin lta bur gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D2022:86b-18: me 'bar ba ltar skra dang smar gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D2022:86b-19: 'brug gi sgra lta bu'i h'um gis mgrin pa'i sbubs gang bar bdag nyid bsams te /
T02D2022:86b-20: mdun du bsgrub bya gos hrul po dri ma can gyon pa lus la dri ma chags pa /
T02D2022:86b-24: dpung pa dang pus mo rnams la sngags kyi cho
T02D2022:86b-25: gas byas pa'i cho ga dang srung ba rnams bshigs
T02D2022:86b-26: nas de'i lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams nye bar
T02D2022:86b-27: bsdus te / rang gi lus la rab tu bcug
T02D2022:86b-28: nas bsgrub bya'i lus khang stong lta bur bsams la
T02D2022:86b-29: bsdus te / / khro bo mtshon cha sna tshogs
T02D2022:86b-30: phyag na bsnams pa sprul nas nga rgyal dang bcas
T02D2022:86b-31: pas bsgrub bya dum bu dum bur byas la khrag
T02D2022:86b-35: rus pa yang bsregs pas thal bar byed cing mdun
T02D2022:86b-36: du char sprin gyi mdog lta bu ma he la
T02D2022:86b-37: gnas pa / thod dbyug dang zhags pa 'dzin pa
T02D2022:86b-38: gsus pa 'phyang ba mche ba gtsigs pa des za
T02D2022:86b-39: bar gyur pa de'i snying la gnas par bsams te
T02D2022:86b-41: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2022:86b-42: h'um lha spyin m'a ra ya h'um /
T02D2022:86b-43: yang na cho ga 'dis 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2022:87a-0: h'um phat yi ge bsgrub bya'i ming la @87a * //
T02D2022:87a-2: de bzhin du bsam gtan la gnas pa'i chogs bsgrub
T02D2022:87a-3: bya lha dang bral zhing lus la dri ma chags
T02D2022:87a-4: pa me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya bzhin
T02D2022:87a-5: mi sdug pa / khro bo sna tshogs kyis ral gri dang /
T02D2022:87a-6: dbyug pa dang gtun shing dang sta re dang mtshon ka na pa dang /
T02D2022:87a-8: 'khor lo dang tri sh'u la dang rtse gsum pa dang mdung dang /
T02D2022:87a-10: mtshon pa ni di pa la dang ldan pa'i phyag
T02D2022:87a-11: mtshan rnams kyis brgyab pas dum bu brgyar bcad cing
T02D2022:87a-12: / bya rog dang 'ug pa dang bya rgod dang
T02D2022:87a-13: spyang ki dang srin po dang mkha' 'gro ma la
T02D2022:87a-14: sogs pa rnams kyis za bar bsam zhing /
T02D2022:87a-15: spobs pas sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02D2022:87a-16: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2022:87a-17: h'um phat lha spyin m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2022:87a-19: gal te grub par ma gyur na sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2022:87a-20: sngags bzlog nas bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2022:87a-21: so // sdang ba la de bzhin du 'khor lo
T02D2022:87a-22: gnyis mngon par bris te bsgrub bya'i ming la phat
T02D2022:87a-23: yig btags la thod pa kha sbyor gyi nang du
T02D2022:87a-24: bcug nas skud pa nag pos dkris te nyi ma
T02D2022:87a-25: gung la dur khrod du sbas te /
T02D2022:87a-26: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gnas pa'i mdun du rta dang /
T02D2022:87a-27: ma he la zhon pa'i bsgrub bya gnyis mtshon ston
T02D2022:87a-28: pa rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs sprul pa phyogs gnyis
T02D2022:87a-29: la gnas pas / phan tshun za zhing 'khrug par byed par bsam zhing bzlas pa bya ba ni /
T02D2022:87a-30: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2022:87a-32: lha spyin mchod spyin dang rnam par dbye bar gyis shig phat /
T02D2022:87a-33: rnam par ldang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2022:87a-34: cho ga 'di nyid kyi 'khor lo gnyis mngon par
T02D2022:87a-35: bris te bsgrub bya'i ming la h'um phat yi ge
T02D2022:87a-36: btags la thod pa kha sbyor du bcug nas skud
T02D2022:87a-37: pa nag pos dril te dur khrod du sbas la
T02D2022:87a-38: / gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyi mdun du
T02D2022:87a-39: yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2022:87a-40: pa'i bsgrub bya rnga mong la zhon pa /
T02D2022:87a-41: lho phyogs su rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs mtshon cha
T02D2022:87a-42: sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams kyis rdeg cing 'gro bar
T02D2022:87a-44: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2022:87a-45: h'um phat lha spyin skrod par gyis shig / h'um phat skrod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2022:87b-0: gshin rje'i gshed kyi @87b bdag srung ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D2022:87b-1: aom ya m'a r'a dza sa do ma ya na ma:/
T02D2022:87b-3: aom ya me do ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2022:87b-5: aom na yo da ya h'um /
T02D2022:87b-7: aom yo ni r'a ba kha ta yakshe ya /
T02D2022:87b-9: aom yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D2022:87b-13: de ltar bskyed tshul drug byas nas /
T02D2022:87b-14: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um bsam mo //
T02D2022:87b-15: rnal 'byor pa khros pas rang gi khrag dang /
T02D2022:87b-16: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang dug dang tshva dang /
T02D2022:87b-17: ske tshe dang mar nag dang da du ra'i lo
T02D2022:87b-18: ma'i khu bas dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo
T02D2022:87b-19: gnyis rim pas bri bar bya'o //
T02D2022:87b-20: gsod pa gshin rje'i sku la gnas //
T02D2022:87b-21: sdang ba rta dang ma he la //
T02D2022:87b-22: bskrad pa rnga mo rgyab na gnas //
T02D2022:87b-24: dbang sdud bud med snying la'o //
T02D2022:87b-25: rgyas pa rta yi rgyab tu ste //
T02D2022:87b-26: lkugs pa lug gi snying la gnas //
T02D2022:87b-27: rengs pa ri rab dbus su ste //
T02D2022:87b-28: 'gugs pa seng ge sha ra bha //
T02D2022:87b-29: gi wam gur gum dag gis kyang //
T02D2022:87b-30: grog la sogs dag la bri //
T02D2022:87b-31: rdza phor kha sbyor nang du gzhug / yongs su 'dud de dag sems kyis //
T02D2022:87b-32: bya rog chen po'i smyu gu ste //
T02D2022:87b-33: nyin gung ro bsregs thab tu sba //
T02D2022:87b-34: thod pa kha sbyor nang bcug nas //
T02D2022:87b-35: bzhin mi sdug gi 'du shes can //
T02D2022:87b-36: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D2022:87b-37: lho phyogs bltas pas chad pas bcad //
T02D2022:87b-38: zhi bar mtha' yi g-yas bsub bya //
T02D2022:87b-39: ni yig gnyis kyang de bzhin du //
T02D2022:87b-40: rjes la dbus kyi ya yig bsub //
T02D2022:87b-41: lhag ma 'bru rnams ci bder gnas //
T02D2022:87b-42: 'di yi bsnyen pa khri phrag gcig / yang dag dngos grub 'dod pas bzlas //
T02D2022:87b-43: gang la bris nas gzhag pa yi //
T02D2022:87b-45: zlum po gsum ni byas nas su //
T02D2022:87b-46: brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa //
T02D2022:87b-47: re'u mig de la 'di ltar dgod //
T02D2022:87b-48: btags pa'i sngags ni bri bar bya //
T02D2022:87b-55: ya kshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D2022:87b-57: re'u mig de la 'di ltar dgod //
T02D2022:87b-58: btags pa'i sngags ni bri la med 'byung ngo //
T02D2022:87b-59: phyogs bral stong pa la bsgrub bya h'um gnyis kyi bar du gzhug go //
T02D2022:88a-1: me da yatstsha ni r'a dza sa do ru na yo ni r'a /
T02D2022:88a-2: 'khor lo gnyis pa la g-yon nas brtsams nas g-yas skor gyis bri'o //
T02D2022:88a-3: 'khor lo gsum pa la shar phyogs nas brtsams nas bar bar gyi re'u mig la /
T02D2022:88a-4: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2022:88a-6: de'i bar bar gyi re'u mig rnams la che ge
T02D2022:88a-7: mo bskrad par gyis shig / sod cig / dbang
T02D2022:88a-8: du gyis shig / sdang bar gyis shig / rgyas
T02D2022:88a-9: par gyis shig / zhi bar gyis shig sv'a h'a
T02D2022:88a-10: / zhes de la sogs pa las kyi rjes su 'brang ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2022:88a-12: tha ma la na ma:dang ba shat dang boo shat dang /
T02D2022:88a-13: h'um phat yi ge dang ldan pa'i sa bon rnams zhi ba dang /
T02D2022:88a-17: 'di dag thams cad bdag nyid bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2022:88a-18: dpal au rgyan nas 'byung ba gshin rje gshed dmar
T02D2022:88a-19: po'i rgyud chen 'bum phrag gsum pa las byung ba
T02D2022:88a-20: slob dpon bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D2022:88a-21: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta dpal mkhas pa chen po d'a na sh'i la /
